description.value: The Character no longer suffers penalties to Tech-Use or Repair Tests due to external distractions, and reduces all penalties from Poor Tools or Working Conditions by 10. (AKA, a -20 Repair Test to fix a tank in a swamp becomes a -10 Repair Test) Essential Repair Skill: Common Lore(Mechanicus) or Common Lore (Tech), or Forbidden Lore (Mechanicus)
